ARABIC: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسْتَقَٰمُوا۟ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسْقَيْنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: If only they were to go straight on the Path, We would give them abundant water to drink
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (Say): "If they keep to the right path We shall give them water in abundance to drink
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: If people were to keep firmly to the Right Way, We would have vouchsafed them abundant rain
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Had they (jinn and mankind) remained steadfast in their religion (Islam), We would certainly have given them abundant water to drink
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I have received the divine revelation that ‘Had they remained upright on the straight path, We would have given them abundant water.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: If they had believed in Allah, and went on the way, We would surely have bestowed on them water in abundance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And that if they should keep to the (right) way, We would certainly give them to drink of abundant water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Would they but go straight on the way, We would give them to drink of water copious,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: If they (the idolaters) tread the right path, We shall give them to drink of water in abundance
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: If they had followed the right path, We would have provided them with abundant rain --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And had they kept to the path surely We would have watered them with rain plenteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: If they are steadfast on the path [of Allah], We shall provide them with abundant water,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (And Allah's Message is): "If they (the Pagans) had (only) remained on the (right) Way, We should certainly have bestowed on them Rain in abundance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: If they (non-Muslims) had believed in Allah, and went on the Right Way (i.e. Islam) We should surely have bestowed on them water (rain) in abundance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: If they had followed the Path We would give to them abundant water to drink,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Had they kept true to the Path, We would have given them plenty water to drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [72:16] God, exalted be He, says [the following] about the Meccan disbelievers: And [it has been revealed to me] that if they (allaw: softened in place of the hardened form, its subject having been omitted, that is to say, annahum [law], which is a supplement to annahu istama‘a, ‘that [a company of jinn] listened’) adopt the [right] path, the path of submission [to God], We will give them abundant water to drink, plenteous [water], from the heaven — this was after rain had been withheld from them for seven years —
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: If they (the idolaters) tread the right path) the path of disbelief; and it is said: the path of Islam, (We shall give them to drink of water in abundance) We shall give them abundant wealth and a comfortable life
